attributes.action: The UK should donate more medical aid to Ukraine.
attributes.additional_details: Ukraine is at war and the troops are in great need of medical aid. We need to get medicine there as soon as possible, and in large quantities. It is imperative that we aid the Ukrainian army in any way we can, this includes medical aid which arguably is paramount.
attributes.background: The UK should provide Ukraine with medical aid (bandages, Ibuprofen, Paracetamol, Celox, Glucometers, Insulin, pain relief medicine, antiseptic wipes/solution, plasters, sanitary products, first aid kits, etc.)

rejection.details: Since you started your petition the Government has announced new funding to help provide aid, including medical supplies, to Ukraine and wider region. Find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/ukraine-uk-pledges-another-80million-in-aid-to-help-ukraine-deal-with-humanitarian-crisis
